TopicTitle: How it sounds like near gas giants.

Articles.Content:
Well, while getting this general wondering I found a youtube video that may or may not be from voyager 1/2. Apparently they have microphones on them but the sound wasn't released or was in archives.

Video:

No sound in space bro.

What you hear in that video are electromagnetic emissions from those planets, shifted down and plugged into audio eq to make them hearable.
